component.name: Beaker
component.summary: A browser for the next-generation Web

description.p: Beaker is an experimental browser for exploring and building the peer-to-peer Web.

ul.li: Adds UPnP port-binding, to help improve connectivity success.
Temporary disables the HTML5 fullscreen APIs due to an issue with upstream.
Fix a bug which caused Beaker to freeze due to bad responses from the dat:// protocol.
Beaker now uses Chromium's process-level sandbox.
